about.bio:
Hi! I'm Pip - a product designer. I've worked in the XR industry since 2019.

I started off at Ultraleap where I led an interaction r&d team, proving the value of high fidelity hand tracking. We focused on rapid prototyping in Unity, and novel spatial interaction design.

I'm now at FitXR, designing the future of fitness - building xr experiences that work at scale, aiming to actively improve people's lives.

I try to combine simplicity and fun to create designs that feel joyful and inevitable.

work.description: FitXR is a leading VR fitness app that transforms home workouts through immersive, gamified training.
